attributes.action: declare a General Election as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more over the years I have realised that this Government have been slowly introducing control from the top down.  Be it "Human Rights" and "Health and Safety".  It's got so that anything what was a normal every day activity is now scrutinised in some way.  I feel like I am living in some sort of diluted Communist State, where the people (us) have to make do and mend, while the people elected to look after our needs abuse their position.  I really really didn't know what "New Labour" meant!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
